Title: Relates to requiring helicopters be equipped with flight recorders, cockpit voice recorders and terrain awareness and warning systems
Summary: Requires helicopters be equipped with flight recorders, cockpit voice recorders and terrain awareness and warning systems.
LawCode: Amd ยง243, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring helicopters be equipped with flight recorders, cockpit voice recorders and terrain awareness and warning systems
